text: There is established the Soil and Water Conservation District as a District of Columbia government agency.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-2803.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-143, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-1701.

Editor's Notes

Section 15 of D.C. Law 4-143 provided that the Soil and Water Conservation District, established by § 8-1703, shall terminate on January 1, 1987, unless it is subsequently reestablished by an act of the Council of the District of Columbia. Section 8-1721, reestablishing the Soil and Water Conservation District, was enacted July 25, 1987.

DC CODE § 8-1703

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)
